resources.string: This application gives you the Common Questions about Android Batch 12 has learned so far. Passing this quiz with different grades infers the level of your knowledge.

string-array.name: android_questions
string-array.item: Which one is not the support language in Android ?
Which one is the API level of Lollipop ?
Which of the following statements about Fragment is wrong?
Which is a sausage like banana?

string-array.name: android_answers
string-array.item: Fragment can send data to other fragment directly.
